summary: A file archiver with a high compression ratio
dopatch:
if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_VERS" = musl ] ; then
    run cd "$PACKAGE_WORKING_DIR/src"

    LIST='7-zip-flags.patch 7-zip-musl.patch'

    for f in $LIST
    do
        wfetch "https://gitlab.alpinelinux.org/alpine/aports/-/raw/master/main/7zip/$f"
    done

    for f in $LIST
    do
        run "patch -p1 --binary < $f"
    done
fi
install:
gmakew -f ../../cmpl_gcc.mak DISABLE_RAR=1 CC="'$CC $CFLAGS $LDFLAGS -D_GNU_SOURCE'" CXX="'$CXX $CXXFLAGS $LDFLAGS -D_GNU_SOURCE'"
install_bins b/g/7zz

prepare:
printf '#define NO_HELP\n' > src/help.h

cat > src/Makefile <<EOF
progs-y		+= apk
apk-objs	:= apk.o help.o \
               app_add.o app_del.o app_fix.o app_update.o app_upgrade.o \
               app_info.o app_list.o app_search.o app_manifest.o \
               app_policy.o app_stats.o \
               app_cache.o app_version.o \
               app_index.o app_fetch.o app_verify.o app_dot.o \
               app_audit.o \
               common.o database.o package.o commit.o solver.o \
               version.o atom.o blob.o hash.o print.o io.o io_url.o io_gunzip.o io_archive.o

LIBS_apk	:= libfetch/libfetch.a -lz -lssl -lcrypto

CFLAGS_ALL		+= -D_ATFILE_SOURCE -Ilibfetch
CFLAGS_apk.o	:= -DAPK_VERSION=\"$PACKAGE_VERSION\"
EOF
install:
gmakew clean LUA=no
gmakew VERBOSE=1 LUA=no CROSS_COMPILE= "CC=$CC" "LD=$CC" "AR=$AR"
install_bins src/apk

run mv xml/5.0/docbook-5.0/* xml/5.0/

################################################################################################################

DEST="$PWD/xslt/1.0/nons"

xmlcatalog --noout --add nextCatalog '' "file://$DEST/catalog.xml" catalog.xml

for ver in 1.79.2 current

    for rewriteItem in rewriteSystem rewriteURI
    do
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "https://cdn.docbook.org/release/xsl-nons/$ver"   "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/$ver" "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
    done
done

################################################################################################################

DEST="$PWD/xslt/1.0/ns"

xmlcatalog --noout --add nextCatalog '' "file://$DEST/catalog.xml" catalog.xml

for ver in 1.79.2 current
do
    for rewriteItem in rewriteSystem rewriteURI
    do
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "https://cdn.docbook.org/release/xsl/$ver"           "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl-ns/$ver" "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
    done
done

summary: Cryptography and SSL/TLS Toolkit
prepare:
if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME" = openbsd ] ; then
    gsed -i 's|-Wl,-z,defs||' Configurations/shared-info.pl

    if isCrossBuild ; then
        export LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -fuse-ld=lld"
        CONFIG_ARGS="$CONFIG_ARGS no-devcryptoeng"
    fi
fi
install:
unset OS_COMPILER

if isCrossBuild ; then
    CMD=./Configure

    case $TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME in
        linux)
            case $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH in
                riscv64) OS_COMPILER='linux64-riscv64' ;;
                s390x)   OS_COMPILER='linux64-s390x'   ;;
                *)       OS_COMPILER="linux-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            esac
            ;;
        macos)
            OS_COMPILER="darwin64-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            ;;
        *bsd)
            case $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH in
                amd64)  OS_COMPILER='BSD-x86_64' ;;
                *)      OS_COMPILER="BSD-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            esac
    esac
else
    CMD=./config
fi

# https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/master/INSTALL.md
run "$CMD" no-tests no-ssl3 no-ssl3-method no-zlib --libdir=lib --openssldir=/etc/ssl --prefix="$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR" "$OS_COMPILER"
gmakew clean
gmakew build_libs
gmakew install_dev

summary: The LLVM Linker
http_parser replacement
Next-gen compiler infrastructure
dep-pkg: binutils-dev libelf libffi libxml2 libedit libz3.a
dep-upp: python3 perl swig curl bsdtar cmake ninja
dopatch:
LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS="$libedit_INCLUDE_DIR;$libedit_INCLUDE_DIR/editline"
LibEdit_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libedit | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake <<EOF
set(LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS "$LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS")
set(LibEdit_LIBRARIES    "$LibEdit_LIBRARIES")
set(LibEdit_FOUND TRUE)

if (NOT TARGET  LibEdit::LibEdit)
    add_library(LibEdit::LibEdit INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(LibEdit::LibEdit PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${LibEdit_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(LibEdit REQUIRED_VARS LibEdit_LIBRARIES LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR LibEdit_VERSION_STRING)
mark_as_advanced(LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS LibEdit_LIBRARIES)
EOF

sedInPlace '/find_library(LibEdit_LIBRARIES/c set(LibEdit_LIBRARIES "${PC_LIBEDIT_LINK_LIBRARIES}")' ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake
sedInPlace '/IMPORTED_LOCATION/c INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES "${LibEdit_LIBRARIES}"'                    ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake

sedInPlace '/add_optional_dependency(LLDB_ENABLE_LIBXML2/c find_package(LibXml2 CONFIG REQUIRED)' ../lldb/cmake/modules/LLDBConfig.cmake
sedInPlace '/find_package(LibXml2/a set(LIBXML2_FOUND TRUE)'                                      ../lldb/cmake/modules/LLDBConfig.cmake

LIBELF_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libelf)"
sedInPlace "/set(LIBOMPTARGET_DEP_LIBELF_INCLUDE_DIRS/a set(LIBOMPTARGET_DEP_LIBELF_LIBRARIES $LIBELF_LIBRARIES)" ../openmp/libomptarget/cmake/Modules/LibomptargetGetDependencies.cmake

dep-upp: bzip2 gm4 flex bison curl bsdtar python3 python3 gmake ninja
dopatch:
if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_VERS" = musl ] ; then
    LIST='
    0006-linux-user-signal.c-define-__SIGRTMIN-MAX-for-non-GN.patch
    xattr_size_max.patch
    MAP_SYNC-fix.patch
    fix-sockios-header.patch
    guest-agent-shutdown.patch
    musl-initialise-msghdr.patch
    fix-strerrorname_np.patch
    liburing.patch
    '

    for f in $LIST
    do
        wfetch "https://gitlab.alpinelinux.org/alpine/aports/-/raw/master/community/qemu/$f"
    done

    for f in $LIST
    do
        patch -p1 < "$f"
    done
fi

gsed -i 's|-static-pie|-pie|' meson.build
gsed -i 's|$meson setup |meson setup --prefer-static |' configure
gsed -i "s|cc.find_library('vdeplug'|cc.find_library('vdeplug', static : true, dirs : ['$vde_LIBRARY_DIR']|" meson.build
gsed -i "s|cc.find_library('cap-ng'|cc.find_library('cap-ng', static : true, dirs : ['$libcap_ng_LIBRARY_DIR']|" meson.build
gsed -i "s|cc.find_library('attr'|cc.find_library('attr', static : true, dirs : ['$libattr_LIBRARY_DIR']|" meson.build
gsed -i "s|cc.find_library('fdt'|cc.find_library('fdt', static : true, dirs : ['$libfdt_LIBRARY_DIR']|" meson.build
gsed -i "/iconv = /c iconv = cc.find_library('iconv', static : true, dirs: ['$libiconv_LIBRARY_DIR'])" meson.build

prepare:
unset MESON_EXTRA_ARGS

if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_VERS" = musl ] ; then
    MESON_EXTRA_ARGS='-Dnss-systemd=false -Dnss-myhostname=false -Dnss-mymachines=false -Dnss-resolve=false'

    LIST='
    0001-binfmt-Don-t-install-dependency-links-at-install-tim.patch
    0002-implment-systemd-sysv-install-for-OE.patch
    0003-coredump-set-ProtectHome-to-read-only.patch
    0004-missing_type.h-add-comparison_fn_t.patch
    0005-add-fallback-parse_printf_format-implementation.patch
    0006-don-t-fail-if-GLOB_BRACE-and-GLOB_ALTDIRFUNC-is-not-.patch
    0007-add-missing-FTW_-macros-for-musl.patch
    0008-Use-uintmax_t-for-handling-rlim_t.patch
    0009-don-t-pass-AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW-flag-to-faccessat.patch
    0010-Define-glibc-compatible-basename-for-non-glibc-syste.patch
    0011-Do-not-disable-buffering-when-writing-to-oom_score_a.patch
    0012-distinguish-XSI-compliant-strerror_r-from-GNU-specif.patch
    0013-avoid-redefinition-of-prctl_mm_map-structure.patch
    0014-do-not-disable-buffer-in-writing-files.patch
    0015-Handle-__cpu_mask-usage.patch
    0016-Handle-missing-gshadow.patch
    0017-missing_syscall.h-Define-MIPS-ABI-defines-for-musl.patch
    0018-pass-correct-parameters-to-getdents64.patch
    0019-Adjust-for-musl-headers.patch
    0020-test-bus-error-strerror-is-assumed-to-be-GNU-specifi.patch
    0021-errno-util-Make-STRERROR-portable-for-musl.patch
    0022-sd-event-Make-malloc_trim-conditional-on-glibc.patch
    0023-shared-Do-not-use-malloc_info-on-musl.patch
    0024-avoid-missing-LOCK_EX-declaration.patch
    0025-include-signal.h-to-avoid-the-undeclared-error.patch
    0026-undef-stdin-for-references-using-stdin-as-a-struct-m.patch
    0027-adjust-header-inclusion-order-to-avoid-redeclaration.patch
    0028-build-path.c-avoid-boot-time-segfault-for-musl.patch
    '

    for f in $LIST
    do
        wfetch "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openembedded/openembedded-core/refs/heads/master/meta/recipes-core/systemd/systemd/$f"
    done

    for f in $LIST
    do
        patch -p1 < "$f"
    done
fi

####################################################################

CURL_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libcurl | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindCURL.cmake <<EOF
set(CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libcurl_INCLUDE_DIR")
set(CURL_LIBRARIES    "$CURL_LIBRARIES")

if (NOT TARGET  CURL::libcurl)
    add_library(CURL::libcurl INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(CURL::libcurl PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${CURL_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(CURL REQUIRED_VARS CURL_LIBRARIES CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR CURL_VERSION)
mark_as_advanced(CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS CURL_LIBRARIES)
EOF

####################################################################

TIFF_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libtiff-4 | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindTIFF.cmake <<EOF
set(TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libtiff_INCLUDE_DIR")

    set_target_properties(TIFF::TIFF PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${TIFF_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

find_package_handle_standard_args(TIFF REQUIRED_VARS TIFF_LIBRARIES TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR TIFF_VERSION)

EOF

####################################################################

LIBARCHIVE_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libarchive | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindLibArchive.cmake <<EOF
set(LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libarchive_INCLUDE_DIR")
set(LibArchive_LIBRARIES    "$LIBARCHIVE_LIBRARIES")

if (NOT TARGET  LibArchive::LibArchive)
    add_library(LibArchive::LibArchive INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(LibArchive::LibArchive PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS}"

endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)

####################################################################

PANGOCAIRO_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l pangocairo) -lintl -lpixman-1 -lffi  -lpcre2-8"

patch -p1 <<EOF
--- a/src/vdetaplib/libvdetap.c
+++ b/src/vdetaplib/libvdetap.c
@@ -121,6 +121,10 @@
        return native_open(path, flags, data);
 }

+/* musl apparently defines open64 as a macro */
+#ifdef open64
+#undef open64
+#endif
 int open64(const char *path, int flags, ...)
 {
    va_list ap;

EOF
